Directed by: Pak Hak, Choe Ik Kye

Cast: Hong Yong-Hee (Kotpun), Park Hwa Song (Sung Hee), Rue Hu Nam (mother), Kim Ryong Rin (Chol Ryong), Ko So Am (landlord)

Description: The action takes place during the Japanese rule in Korea. The game's story - the fate of the girl and her family Kotpun. Kotpun sells flowers on the street to buy medicine sick mother. That, in spite of his illness, the landlord is forced to work off the debt. Younger sister Sung Hee blind fault of the landowner, and his brother in revenge set fire to the mansion and went to jail ...

Extras. Info: Immortal classic "play" Flower "was written with the participation of Kim Il Sung in 1930 in the Chinese countryside Wujiazi. After the formation of the DPRK on her opera was staged, and then offered you a movie. the importance attached to this film can be judged from the fact that its main character portrayed by odnovonovyh bills in 1978 and 1992. Foreign authors refer to it as the Korean "Gone with the Wind
